name: Persistence and attainment among 2011–12 first-time postsecondary students who began postsecondary education in community colleges, by field: 2014 and 2017
description: Persistence and attainment among 2011–12 first-time postsecondary students who began postsecondary education in community colleges, by field: 2014 and 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_number_of_2011_12_first_time_beginning_postsecondary_students
variableMeasured.description: Number Of 2011 12 First Time Beginning Postsecondary Students

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2014_no_attainment_not_enrolled
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2014 No Attainment Not Enrolled

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2014_no_attainment_still_enrolled
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2014 No Attainment Still Enrolled

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2014_associate_s_degree
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2014 Associate S Degree

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2014_bachelor_s_degree
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2014 Bachelor S Degree

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2017_no_attainment_not_enrolled
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2017 No Attainment Not Enrolled

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2017_no_attainment_still_enrolled
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2017 No Attainment Still Enrolled

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2017_associate_s_degree
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2017 Associate S Degree

variableMeasured.name: field_persistence_and_attainment_in_2017_bachelor_s_degree
variableMeasured.description: Persistence And Attainment In 2017 Bachelor S Degree

notes: Data are based on institutions eligible to participate in Title IV federal financial aid programs. Students had formally declared their field of study at their institution. Attainment categories are mutually exclusive and represent the highest credential earned.
sources: National Center for Education Statistics, 2012/17 Beginning Postsecondary Students Longitudinal Study (BPS:12/17). Science and Engineering Indicators
